summary: The staff of the island resort need the aid of the Harlem Globetrotters to keep their island from a greedy millionaire.
cast: Bob Denver|Alan Hale Jr.|Jim Backus|Natalie Schafer|Constance Forslund|Russell Johnson|Dawn Wells|David Ruprecht|Martin Landau|Barbara Bain|Scatman Crothers|Whitney Rydbeck|Dreama Perry Denver|Rosalind Chao|Stu Nahan|Chick Hearn|Bruce Briggs|Cindee Appleton|Wendy Hoffman|Geese Ausbie|Clyde Austin|Jimmy Blacklock|Nate Branch|Lou Dunbar|Tex Harrison|Theodis Lee|Bobby Joe Mason|Curley Neal|Robert Paige
title: The Harlem Globetrotters on Gilligan's Island
